meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Terri Timanus Peter Gordon Seth Davis Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1621.

td.p: Terri Timanus, an administrative assistant originally from Denton, Kansas
Peter Gordon, an advertising account supervisor from Wilmington, Delaware
Seth Davis, an environmental lawyer from Croton-on-Hudson, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,601)

tr.td: CELEBRITY QUOTES
ANIMALS
EUROPE
AUTHORS
TECHNOLOGY
THE DUCHESS OF WINDSOR

Peter
Terri

(including 1 DD),
